channel.description: Recent content in photography on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: A Visit From Flickr!
item.description: One of the best perks of working at Yahoo! is getting to attend first-class talks, especially when the talk is by one of your favorite groups. In this case, Flickr! Flickr schwag: lens cleaner, phone cleaner, or iPhone 4 reception-enabler? …and it helps if one of the speakers was once a member of your team (Markus was in Yahoo! Mobile until recently). Markus Spiering of Flickr I probably can’t chat too much about the future improvements they talked about, but I’ll just say there are some exciting plans for Flickr in the coming months!
